Num.FuncTxt: if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then return 900000 else return 60000 end

Str.FuncTxt: local self = GetSkillOwner(obj); local abil = GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, "Cleric10"); if abil > 0 then return "FRIEND" else return "ALL" end

Num.FuncTxt: local abil_lev = GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, "Cleric5"); return 4000 + obj.Level*2000 + abil_lev*1000;
if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then return 2500 else return 5000 end
local value = 8000 + (obj.Level * 2000) local abilLevel = GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, "Elementalist9") if IMCRandom(1, 9999) < abilLevel * 500 then return value * 2 else return value; end
local owner = GetOwner(self); local skl = GetSkill(owner, 'Falconer_Aiming'); return skl.Level * 15000;
local owner = GetOwner(self); local skl = GetSkill(owner, 'Falconer_Aiming'); return skl.Level;
if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then return 900000 else return 20000 + obj.Level * 2000 end

Str.FuncTxt: local abilLevel = GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, 'Necromancer16'); if abilLevel > 0 then return 'HigherRotten_Debuff'; else return 'DirtyWall_Debuff'; end

Num.FuncTxt: if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then return 900000 else return 15000 end
if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then return 6; else return 45; end
if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then return 5000 + GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, "Warlock3") * 800 else return 10000 + GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, "Warlock3") * 800 end

Str.FuncTxt: local abilLevel = GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, 'Necromancer16'); if abilLevel > 0 then return 'HigherRotten_Debuff'; else return 'DirtyWall_Debuff'; end

Num.FuncTxt: local self = GetSkillOwner(obj); return 10000 + obj.Level * 1000 + GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, "Druid1")*1000;
if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then return 900000 else return 30000 + obj.Level * 5000 end
